instructions.instruction: You are a product designer at a consumer electronics firm tasked with updating a popular smartwatch model. Review the existing features and propose your approach for the next model's design and functionality.

You are an urban planner assigned to improve a city park that currently follows a standard rectangular layout with sports fields and walking paths. Develop a plan to enhance the park's utility and appeal for diverse users.

You are an educator preparing a lesson on climate change for high school students, using the current curriculum. Describe how you would structure and deliver the lesson to maximize understanding and engagement.
You are a marketing manager tasked with launching a new beverage in a market where similar products already exist. Outline your campaign strategy to promote the product effectively.
You are a restaurant manager who needs to refresh the lunch menu, which currently offers standard fare. Suggest your approach for updating the menu to better attract midday customers.
You are an operations manager at a distribution warehouse using standard operating procedures for inventory management. Present your plan to improve efficiency and reduce errors.
You are a software developer updating a mobile app that follows established design patterns. Describe your approach to revising the app to boost user satisfaction.
You are a school principal addressing declining attendance by relying on standard communication and intervention methods. Describe your strategy to encourage regular student attendance.
You are a healthcare administrator tasked with increasing vaccination rates at a clinic, which currently uses standard outreach methods. Outline your approach to achieving this goal.
You are a travel agency manager looking to update a tour package that has followed the same itinerary for years. Detail your plan to refresh the package and boost bookings.

You are a finance officer in charge of preparing the annual report, which typically follows a set template. Explain how you would approach this year’s report to ensure clarity and usefulness for stakeholders.
You are a customer service team lead at a telecom company, where standard scripts are used to handle complaints. Describe your plan to improve customer satisfaction metrics.
You are a training coordinator updating the onboarding process for new hires, which currently follows a checklist format. Present your recommendations for enhancing the onboarding experience.
You are a museum curator responsible for an exhibit on local history, which traditionally uses chronological displays and text panels. Describe how you would design this exhibit.
You are a logistics manager overseeing delivery routes that have remained unchanged for several years. Outline your approach to optimizing these routes for cost and speed.
You are a program coordinator at a public library tasked with increasing adult attendance at weekly events, which currently use standard themes and formats. Explain your strategy.
You are an HR specialist revamping the annual employee recognition program, which typically includes awards and certificates. Propose your plan for this year’s program.
You are a safety officer reviewing the company’s established emergency response protocol. Summarize your approach to ensuring employee preparedness.
You are a retail store manager with a standard floor layout and merchandising strategy. Outline how you would organize the store to improve customer experience and sales.
You are a science teacher planning a unit on renewable energy using the department’s existing materials. Describe your method for teaching this unit.
You are a nonprofit project leader tasked with fundraising for a recurring cause using traditional outreach events. Present your strategy for this year’s fundraising drive.
You are a product manager responsible for an annual user conference that typically follows a keynote, breakout sessions, and networking. Outline your plan for the upcoming event.
You are a university admissions officer reviewing the established campus tour format for prospective students. Suggest your approach to delivering the tour this semester.
You are a web content editor for a news site with a standard publishing process. Describe how you would approach managing content to increase readership.
You are a sustainability coordinator at a corporate office with an existing recycling program. Present your plan to further reduce the organization’s environmental footprint.
